description: This file contains a JavaScript module that defines underscore.js's template system, initializes Google Analytics, and includes functions for fetching files and issues, as well as a Learn class for dynamically inserting content based on JSON data.

classes.name: Learn
classes.description: A class for loading and displaying framework-specific information and issues from JSON data, and inserting it into the DOM.

methods.name: Learn.prototype.append
methods.description: Inserts a dynamically generated aside element into the DOM with framework info and demo links.

methods.name: Learn.prototype.fetchIssueCount
methods.description: Fetches the number of open issues from GitHub API and updates the DOM accordingly.
